page.title: 11TRANSPORT/EPPING FOREST
page.content:
LANES LINK WITH{WATERWORKS CORNER {ROUNDABOUT}AS THE M11 ENDS AND THE PRINCIPAL ROAD IS ONCE AGAIN THE NORTH CIRCULAR ROAD.THIS CAUSES{NOTORIOUS {TRAFFIC JAMS IN THE RUSH HOUR.}THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE{NEW LONDON ORBITAL {MOTORWAY}WHICH LINKS WITH THE M11 SOME 9 MILES TO THE NORTH IS GOING SOME WAY TO ALLEVIATE THESE JAMS.
PART OF{EPPING FOREST}STILL SURVIVES IN THIS AREA. THE FOREST BELONGED TO THE CROWN SINCE THE{NORMAN CONQUEST BUT ABOUT{100 YEARS AGO EPPING FOREST {WAS GIVEN TO THE PEOPLE OF LONDON FOR {ALL TIME BY QUEEN VICTORIA.}THUS DESPITE ALL EFFORTS BY DEVELOPERS THE FOREST REMAINS GENERALLY IN TACT IN THIS AREA AT THE PRESENT TIME.IN THIS PART OF THE FOREST TWO TREES PREDOMINATE-{HORNBEAM AND OAK}-THE OTHER TWO MAIN TREES BEING ABSENT (
